plot: Documentary about the French-Vietnamese choreographer Ea Sola and the creation of her performance 'Secheresse et Pluie' (Draught and Rain), filmed during the last tour, on location in theaters in Netherlands, Belgium and France.
title: Ea Sola - Sécheresse et pluie
plot_es: Documentary about the French-Vietnamese choreographer Ea Sola and the creation of her performance 'Secheresse et Pluie' (Draught and Rain), filmed during the last tour, on location in theaters in Netherlands, Belgium and France.
plot_en: Documentary about the French-Vietnamese choreographer Ea Sola and the creation of her performance 'Secheresse et Pluie' (Draught and Rain), filmed during the last tour, on location in theaters in Netherlands, Belgium and France.
